    Package Description
    org.xchain.framework.hibernate  
    org.xchain.framework.lifecycle
    Provides classes that execute the XChain lifecycle.
    org.xchain.framework.quartz  

    • Uses of StartStep in org.xchain.framework.hibernate

      Methods in org.xchain.framework.hibernate with annotations of type StartStep 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void HibernateLifecycle.startHibernateConfig(LifecycleContext context)
      Does Hibernate configuration.
      static void HibernateLifecycle.startLifecycle()
      Configures a hibernate using the default hibernate configuration file located on the classpath.

      static void Lifecycle.startConfiguration(LifecycleContext context, ConfigDocumentContext configDocContext)
      Lifecycle Step to load the xchain configuration.
      static void Lifecycle.startCreateConfigDocumentContext()
      This step creates a ConfigDocumentContext instance which will be passed to all lifecycle start steps, which take a ConfigDocumentContext, when Lifecycle.startLifecycle() is called.
      static void Lifecycle.startDefaultConversions(LifecycleContext lifecycleContext)
      Sets up the default conversion objects in the bean utils.
      static void Lifecycle.startDefaultXmlFactory(LifecycleContext context)
      Sets the default SAX, XSLT, and DOM implementations to use on the XmlFactoryLifecycle for those that are not already set.
      static void ContainerLifecycle.startLifecycle(LifecycleContext context)
      Setup Servlet Context resource access.
